messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Pen/Email/Chat Pals for kids
messages.msgSnippet: Dana, My daughter would love a penpal. Please write to me at bueh2k@msn.com. Thanks Cindy ... From: riverfolk0204 Sent: Sunday, August 25, 2002 10:40 PM To:
messages.messageBody:
Dana,

My daughter would love a penpal. Please write to me at bueh2k@....

Thanks
Cindy

----- Original Message -----
From: riverfolk0204
Sent: Sunday, August 25, 2002 10:40 PM
To: Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com
Subject: [Unschooling-dotcom] Pen/Email/Chat Pals for kids

Hello all, I'm fairly new to this list and am sure this has probably
been broached before, but I am looking for kids to pen pal, email pal
and/or chat pal with my two. The boy is 9 and the girl is 7-- both
have wide and varied interests. Anyone else out there interested in
setting your kids up to do this? Please feel free to email me! Thanks!
DanaB

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Pen/Email/Chat Pals for kids
messages.msgSnippet: Hi There! Welcome to our list! On the Unschooling.com message boards they have folders for the younger crowd. It s a great safe place for the kids.
messages.messageBody:
Hi There! Welcome to our list!
On the Unschooling.com message boards they have folders for the younger
crowd. It's a great safe place for the kids.
www.unschooling.com
~Elissa Cleaveland
An unlesson'd girl, unschool'd, unpractic'd;
Happy in this, she is not so old
But she may learn.
W.S. The Merchant of Venice III, ii, 160
